channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 一名巴西裔美国商人被指控利用瑞士信贷、瑞银和其他瑞士银行在 35 年间向美国税务机关隐藏了 2,000 多万美元的资产
item.description:
A Brazilian-American businessman was charged with using Credit Suisse, UBS and other Swiss banks to hide more than $20 million in assets from US tax authorities over 35 years https://t.co/Nd7zIZcZwu

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 日本央行周一没有介入日本股市，即使基准指数大幅下跌
item.description:
The BOJ stayed out of Japan’s stock market on Monday even as the benchmark plunged https://t.co/yWuyEAj9CK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 泰森食品公司决定永久关闭位于爱荷华州佩里的猪肉工厂
item.description:
Tyson Foods has decided to permanently shut its pork facility in Perry, Iowa https://t.co/lktSewdtHG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 彭博社的一项调查显示，绝大多数日本央行观察人士仍预计负利率将在 4 月结束，但几乎所有人都认为负利率有可能在下周出现。
item.description:
A slim majority of Bank of Japan watchers still expects the end of negative rates to come in April, but almost everyone agrees there’s a risk the move could come next week, according to a Bloomberg survey https://t.co/Ig7vEFLYSy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）为她的国民公会（National Rally）党去毒的努力为她赢得了超越法国传统极右翼选民的支持。一些人认为，这种支持足以将她推上 2027 年的总统宝座。
item.description:
Marine Le Pen's efforts to de-toxify her National Rally party have won her support beyond traditional far-right voters in France. Some believe that support could be enough to propel her to the presidency in 2027. https://t.co/ZiexSgk4DD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 本周，法兰克福一家劳工法院驳回了德国铁路公司（Deutsche Bahn）提出的阻止一个规模虽小但颇具影响力的火车司机工会再次举行罢工的请求。
item.description:
A Frankfurt labor court rejected a request to block another strike by a small but influential train driver union this week, dismissing a case filed by Deutsche Bahn https://t.co/roNW1bpZ6m

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 今年，投资者的兴趣浪潮正推动数十亿美元流入加密货币资产，将资金流入量推向破纪录的水平
item.description:
A wave of investor interest is driving billions of dollars into cryptocurrency assets this year, pushing inflows to record-breaking levels https://t.co/8Qefrb5c3C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 代表 Signa Prime 债权人的委员会否决了将奥地利房产出售给 Schoeller 集团的提议
item.description:
A committee representing Signa Prime creditors has rejected a proposed sale of Austrian property to the Schoeller Group https://t.co/Ru3H6VWIsK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 花旗集团（Citigroup）分析师表示，相比美联储下周的利率决定，期权市场更关注周二通胀报告可能引发的 S&P 500 指数大幅波动。
item.description:
The options market is more concerned about a potentially big S&P 500 move on Tuesday’s inflation report than it is about the Federal Reserve’s interest rate decision next week, Citigroup analysts said. https://t.co/bJh8Wxcz88

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 随着交易量和资金流入量创下新高，人工智能多头越来越青睐一只加大对英伟达押注的 ETF 基金
item.description:
Artificial-intelligence bulls are increasingly gravitating toward an ETF that amps up bets on Nvidia as trading volumes and inflows hit records https://t.co/gQqeMXho7X

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的财政愿望清单--也就是他的 2025 年预算提案--包括一系列税收计划，这些计划必将成为华盛顿游说者的盛宴
item.description:
President Joe Biden’s fiscal wish list — otherwise known as his 2025 budget proposal — includes a slew of tax plans that are sure to be a feast for Washington lobbyists https://t.co/KqiszBAUSm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 欧盟执行机构将建议波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那开始加入欧盟的谈判，这将极大地推动这个巴尔干国家加入欧盟的进程。
item.description:
The European Union’s executive arm will recommend that Bosnia-Herzegovina start accession talks in a major boost for the Balkan nation’s bid to join the bloc. https://t.co/JrD3MRqVLH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 卢拉总统说，巴西国家石油公司需要牢记巴西人民是公司的股东，似乎要对令市场哗然的股息削减措施加倍支持
item.description:
President Lula said Petrobras needs to be mindful that the Brazilian people are its shareholders, appearing to double down on dividend cuts that have roiled the market https://t.co/wRCASDsztb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 瑞士信贷银行前首席执行官蒂贾内-蒂亚姆（Tidjane Thiam）表示，他有意于明年十月竞选象牙海岸总统。
item.description:
Former Credit Suisse Chief Executive Officer Tidjane Thiam signaled his intention to run for president of Ivory Coast in October next year. https://t.co/hOFeTXDOaI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）的新闻集团和《每日邮报》的所有者就联合收购英国最著名的报纸之一《每日电讯报》的可能性进行了会谈，同时会谈的还有阿联酋支持的投资基金 RedBird IMI。
item.description:
Rupert Murdoch’s News Corp. and the owner of the Daily Mail have held talks about a potential joint takeover of the Telegraph — one of the UK’s most famous newspapers — alongside the UAE-backed investment fund RedBird IMI. https://t.co/EfTEgbF94X

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国银行在报告首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）2023 年的薪酬被削减一个月后，披露了两名最高级别高管的加薪幅度超过 10%。
item.description:
Bank of America disclosed pay increases of more than 10% for two of its highest-ranking executives a month after reporting that CEO Brian Moynihan’s compensation was cut for 2023. https://t.co/3ZUA7mMfUe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 越来越多的美国人感到经济不安全--但又不想停止餐饮和旅游消费
item.description:
More Americans feel financially insecure — but don't want to stop spending on restaurants and travel https://t.co/kKPv4ikP5v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 瑞士信贷银行的一位前高管将负责欧洲最古老的汽车王朝之一的投资公司，与越来越多的女性一起在为超级富豪服务的基金管理公司中担任高级职务。
item.description:
A former Credit Suisse executive will oversee investment firms for one of Europe’s oldest auto dynasties, joining a rising number of women in top roles at money managers for the ultra-rich. https://t.co/QYbAIAeazY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 加拿大海外石油公司已在本国和美国申请破产，并表示打算进行重组
item.description:
Canadian Overseas Petroleum has filed for bankruptcy in its home country and the US and said it intends to restructure https://t.co/yuB0hrDFUO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统的预算提案要求对企业和富人全面增税，这是明年即将在华盛顿展开的税收斗争的开端。
item.description:
President Joe Biden’s budget proposal — which calls for sweeping tax increases on corporations and the wealthy — is the opening round of a looming tax fight set to consume Washington next year. https://t.co/7zBrD9PNmI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 法国财政部长表示，法国政府将重新评估补贴政策，以支持能带来最具成本效益的环境效益的政策
item.description:
The French government will re-assess subsidies to favor policies that deliver the most cost-effective environmental benefits, the finance minister says https://t.co/dqyJBBo1gl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 意大利将允许 ION 集团在满足某些条件的情况下继续收购资产管理公司 Prelios。
item.description:
Italy will allow ION Group’s acquisition of asset manager Prelios to go ahead with some conditions. https://t.co/bqGtx464ev

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨希望深化与泰国、马来西亚和菲律宾的经济和安全关系，使亚洲贸易关系多样化
item.description:
German Chancellor Olaf Scholz is looking to deepen economic and security ties with Thailand, Malaysia and the Philippines to diversify trade relations in Asia https://t.co/njnYh9G91f

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 芝加哥熊队正采取措施留在美国第三大城市，计划投入 20 多亿美元的私人投资建造一座新球场
item.description:
The Chicago Bears are taking steps to stay in the third-largest US city with a plan to contribute more than $2 billion of private investment to build a new stadium https://t.co/uR2Za7b317

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 美国银行认为，几乎没有证据支持华尔街的忧虑者，他们说股市涨得太快太猛，正在接近泡沫区域。
item.description:
Bank of America sees little evidence to support the worriers on Wall Street who say the stock market has risen too far, too fast and is approaching bubble territory. https://t.co/aY55ESNQ6h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 住房和城市发展部部长玛西娅-福吉（Marcia Fudge）计划离开政府
item.description:
Housing and Urban Development Secretary Marcia Fudge plans to depart the administration https://t.co/BarHYLrfKz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）与美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）就加强产品互认方面的合作进行了会谈，目的是达成一种形式的有限贸易协定
item.description:
German Economy Minister Robert Habeck spoke with US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo about intensifying cooperation on the mutual recognition of products with the aim of reaching a form of limited trade pact https://t.co/wOQuuj2YjA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 比特币破纪录的涨势似乎每天都在创造约 1,500 个新的百万富翁钱包
item.description:
Bitcoin’s record-breaking rally appears to be creating around 1,500 new millionaire wallets each day https://t.co/nUeV1eN8X3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: 葡萄牙极右翼政党切加党在提前举行的大选中将其议会席位增加了四倍。@carlacanivete解释说，在少数派政府的领导下，葡萄牙现在正走向一段政治不稳定时期。
item.description:
Portugal’s far-right Chega party quadrupled its parliamentary seats at an early general election

The country is now headed for a period of political instability under a minority government, as @carlacanivete explains https://t.co/o95bm7Efly pic.twitter.com/hHN3sQDkou

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024

item.title: S&P 500 指数在 2023 年跃升 24% 后，2024 年开始时又将攀升近 7%，你会认为财经媒体会呼吁谨慎行事，但事实并非如此
item.description:
With the S&P 500 Index climbing almost 7% to start 2024 after jumping 24% in 2023, you’d think the financial press would be urging caution, but that’s not happening https://t.co/3DpBn4L4UL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 11, 2024
